name: weather
author: Jakub Siberski <jakub.siberski@gmail.com>
description: Example weather app written in N4JS/JavaScript

scripts.test: n4js-mangelhaft --d --projects . --compile --targetPlatformFile targetplatform.n4tp --targetPlatformInstallLocation build/npm --xunitReportFile build/weather-test-report.xml --xunitReportName weather-test-report --xunitReportPackage weather.tests
